title: Fallen Hero

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Attack someone.
-Add a player into your **Soul**
-Pick a player that Is in your **Soul.** You will gain a random ability from that player.
-Pick a player that Is in your **Soul**. You will redirect them to another player, and transform their visit into a Basic Attack.
-Pick two players in your **Soul**. You will redirect them to each other, and transform their visit into a Powerful Attack.
-[Soul Blast-4] When using this ability, you may pay the cost. If you do, you will deal an Unstoppable Rampage Attack the following 2 nights.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-**Soul:** When a player enters a **Soul**, they are roleblocked. The player remains in the **Soul** for the rest of the game (unless removed by things such as Soul Blast.) The user of the **Soul** knows who players in the **Soul** visit. Players in the **Soul** do not know they are in the **Soul.**
-**Soul Blast-X** Choose exactly X players in your **Soul**, and remove them from your **Soul**. If you cannot remove exactly X players, you may not **Soul Blast.**
-To **pay the cost** means to perform the actions written in [] at the start of the ability.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last one standing. (NK Goal)

desc:
